org.middleheaven.process.web.server
Interface HttpServerService

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractHttpServerService
@Service
public interface HttpServerService

Service to process server-side HTTP requests.

resolverRenderingProcessor

RenderingProcessor resolverRenderingProcessor(java.lang.String incomingUrl,
                                              java.lang.String viewName,
                                              java.lang.String contentType)
Discovers and returns the ViewProcessor that can, according to it's registered UrlMapping, render the given url.

Parameters:
incomingUrl - the filename from the request
outcomeUrl - the view name from the outcome
contentType - the contentType for the result content.
Returns:
or null if none matches

resolveControlProcessor

HttpProcessor resolveControlProcessor(java.lang.String url)
Discovers and returns the HttpProcessor that can, according to it's registered UrlMapping, process the given url.

Parameters:
url - the url to process.
Returns:
or null if none matches

setAvailable

void setAvailable(boolean available)
Set the availability state of this service. If the service is available requests will be processed. If not, a TEMPORARY_UNAVAILABLE HTTP error code will be returned.

Parameters:
available - the availability status of the HttpServerService.

isAvailable

boolean isAvailable()
Returns:
true if the service is available, false otherwise

start

void start()
Initialize the server and put in an available state

See Also:
setAvailable(boolean)

stop

void stop()
Renders the server inert. No further requests will be processed. After calling this method this service instance is useless and should be removed.
